Definition at line 109 of file package_manager_view.php.

            {
                  try
                  {
                        $PackageAlgorithms = get_package( 'core::package_algorithms' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
                        $Packages = $PackageAlgorithms->get_packages_tree();

                        $this->Output = '<div class="tree_control"><ul class="ltr"><li id="phtml_system" class="open" '.
                                                      'rel="root"><a href="#"><ins>&nbsp</ins>/</a><ul>';
                        
                        foreach( $Packages as $i => $Package )
                        {
                              $Title = $Package[ 'package_name' ].'.'.$Package[ 'package_version' ];
                              
                              $this->Output .= "<li id=\"phtml_$Title\"><a href=\"#\"><ins>&nbsp;</ins>$Title</a>";

                              $this->Output .= $this->show_package_tree_rec( $Package[ 'subpackages' ] );

                              $this->Output .= '</li>';
                        }
                        
                        $this->Output .= '</ul></div>';
                  }
                  catch( Exception $e )
                  {
                        $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
                  }
            }

                        {

            {
                  try
                  {
                        if( isset( $ConfigFiles[ 0 ] ) == false )
                        {
                              return( '' );
                        }
                        
                        $Brunch = '<ul><li id=\"phtml_dummy\"><a href=\"#\"><ins>&nbsp;</ins>{lang:conf}</a><ul>';
                        
                        foreach( $ConfigFiles as $i => $File )
                        {
                              $Title = basename( $File );
                              
                              $Brunch .= "<li id=\"phtml_$Title\" class=\"config\"><a href=\"#\"><ins>&nbsp;</ins>$Title</a></li>";
                        }
                        
                        return( "$Brunch</ul></li></ul>" );

Definition at line 256 of file package_manager_view.php.

            {
                  try
                  {
                        if( isset( $Packages[ 0 ] ) == false )
                        {
                              return( '' );
                        }
                        
                        $Brunch = '<ul><li id=\"phtml_dummy\"><a href=\"#\"><ins>&nbsp;</ins>{lang:packages}</a><ul>';
                        
                        foreach( $Packages as $i => $Package )
                        {
                              $Title = $Package[ 'package_name' ].'.'.$Package[ 'package_version' ];
                              $Brunch .= "<li id=\"phtml_$Title\"><a href=\"#\"><ins>&nbsp;</ins>$Title</a>";

                              $Brunch .= $this->show_system_tree_rec( $Package[ 'subpackages' ] );
                              
                              $Brunch .= $this->show_system_tree_meta_rec( $Package[ 'meta' ] );
                              
                              $Brunch .= $this->show_system_tree_conf_rec( $Package[ 'conf' ] );
                              
                              $Brunch .= '</li>';
                        }
                        
                        return( "$Brunch</ul></li></ul>" );
                  }
                  catch( Exception $e )

Definition at line 361 of file package_manager_view.php.

            {
                  try
                  {                       
                        $Context = get_package( 'gui::context' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
                        
                        $Context->load_config( dirname( __FILE__ ).'/conf/cfcx_show_package_tree' );
                        if( $Context->execute( $Options , $this ) )return( $this->Output );
                        
                        $Context->load_config( dirname( __FILE__ ).'/conf/cfcx_show_system_tree' );
                        if( $Context->execute( $Options , $this ) )return( $this->Output );
                  }
                  catch( Exception $e )
                  {
                        $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
